name: Pool (itch) (Linaiz)
description:
Simple 3D pool game experiment, featuring primitive shapes and textures. Visuals implemented using Three.js. Ball physics and collisions programmed with javascript (not polished).

Controls:

[ 1 ] [ 2 ] [ 3 ] - switch between cameras

[ 4 ] [ 5 ] [ 6 ]  [ 7 ]  [ 8 ]  [ 9 ] - select between sticks

Left / Right Arrow - adjust angle of chosen stick

[ Space ] - shoot!
